text: Władysław Krzyżanowski (1905-1985) was a sailor from Poland, who represented his country at the 1928 Summer Olympics in Amsterdam, Netherlands. == Sources == * Category:1905 births Category:1985 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Minsk Category:People from Minsky Uyezd Category:Imperial Russian people of Polish descent Category:Polish male sailors (sport) Category:Olympic sailors of Poland Category:Sailors at the 1928 Summer Olympics – 12' Dinghy
title: Władysław Krzyżanowski
